desc.tprequest.trtpa: /trtpa <Player> : Send a request to teleport to the location of the target player.
desc.tprequest.trtpahere: /trtpahere <Player> : Send a request, asking the target player to teleport to your location.
desc.tprequest.trtpaccept: /trtpaccept : Accept the pending request. If more than one, list them.
desc.tprequest.trtpcancel: /trtpcancel : Cancel the pending request. If more than one, list them.
desc.tprequest.trtpdeny: /trtpdeny : Deny the pending request. If more than one, list them.
desc.tprequest.trtpignore: /trtpignore : Ignore the pending request. If more than one, list them.
msg.tprequest.not_present: Cannot get request sender or receiver...
msg.tprequest.reload.failure: Errors occurred while reloading Teleportation Request configuration, reset to default.
msg.tprequest.sent: Teleportation request sent! Expiration Time: %s second(s)
